snippet: The charter bus was taking about 70 people from New York City to the Mohegan Sun casino when it crashed during a snowstorm, the police said.
abstract: Charter bus owned by Dahlia Inc and operated by VMC East Coast flips onto its side while bound from New York City to Mohegan Sun casino in Uncasville, Conn, in middle of snowstorm, injuring over 30 people.
lead_paragraph: The charter bus was taking about 70 people from New York City to the Mohegan Sun casino when it crashed during a snowstorm, the police said.

headline.main: Connecticut Bus Crash Leaves More Than 30 Injured
headline.print_headline: Over 30 Hurt as Bus Crashes on Interstate in Connecticut
